title: Trend Hinge Recess Squaring Corner Chisel, Quickly Square Up Rounded Corners, C/CHISEL
description: If you have a rounded recess in wood that needs to be a squared corner, this Trend Corner Chisel is ideal for your job. You will find this chisel ideal for squaring hinge recesses in door frames and door edges, as well as lock faceplates. Use a common hammer with a square blow to get your perfect angles in no time with this corner chisel.
